name: Falling in Reverse Dashboard theme
description: Turns the Tumblr logo into a Falling in Reverse Logo, and changed background to Ronnie radke. Follow me! http://pastoriagym.tumblr.com/
additional_info:
19/6/14 Fixed the http to https issue
18/8/14 Fixed blue box issue, again

Blue bits are back, you can install https://userstyles.org/styles/95980/remove-blue-bits to get rid of it.
